JOB DESCRIPTION:
• Maintain a day-to-day contact with Project Leader and apprise him/ her of daily task status. 

• Train the Junior Programmer about standard practices followed in the company for design of data structures and coding. 

• Create required data structures,  write program code and test harness. 

• Will evaluate and validate the code compiled by Junior Programmer. 

• Help the support personnel in locating and fixing bugs and defects. 

• Write the user guide for the development done by him/ her.
